messageBody:
I think I've got this working using separate ClassLoaders.

I created a JUnit 3 TestSuite that loads each test in a separate
ClassLoader. I started to update it to be a JUnit 4 Suite, based
on the JUnit 4.6 docs, but I ran into a problem with maven not being
able to find JUnit 4.6.

If I go to http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/junit/junit/ it's clearly there.
But if I look at http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/junit/junit/maven-metadata.xml
it stops at version 4.4. Any idea how to get this fixed?
